rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area with a built-in coat stand and polished stone finishes, ensuring ample natural light from front-facing windows.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large art deco inspired living space with high ceilings, ornate detailing, and extensive use of natural light through bay windows and French doors leading to the courtyard.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A well-appointed dining area adjacent to the living room, featuring a large central table with Art Deco accents. Natural ventilation ensured by cross-ventilation from adjoining openings.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An open space serving as a focal point for natural light and air circulation, decorated with decorative fountains and vegetation following Vastu guidelines to enhance positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A luxurious bedroom with an ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet and a private balcony overlooking the courtyard. The design follows Art Deco aesthetics with geometric patterns.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Well-ventilated and naturally lit room, equipped with modern amenities and traditional touches in keeping with luxury interior design.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom designed for family members, ensuring abundant natural light and optimal ventilation as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Dedicated space with a private bath, designed to offer comfort while maintaining the architectural theme of luxury.

openings.location: Corner of ground floor and first floor

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace designed with soundproofing and an emphasis on natural light, ensuring a productive environment. Art Deco motifs and luxury finishes are incorporated.

rooms.name: Library/Study
rooms.description: An adjoining space for reading and research that complements the home office, featuring built-in bookshelves and ambient lighting.
